QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, int_clarityattributes.id odf_pk, int_clarityattributes.clarity_attr_code as clarity_attr_code, int_clarityattributes.code as code, int_clarityattributes.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, int_clarityattributes.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, int_clarityattributes.clarity_object as clarity_object, int_clarityattributes.extended_type as extended_type, int_clarityattributes.clarity_data_type as clarity_data_type, INT_CLARITYATTRIBUTES.CREATED_DATE as created_date, INT_CLARITYATTRIBUTES.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, int_clarityattributes.clarity_api_alias as clarity_api_alias, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by from int_clarityattributes int_clarityattributes, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED where 1 = 1 and int_clarityattributes.created_by = CREATED.user_id and int_clarityattributes.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id
